org.cicirello.search.problems.scheduling

Class SchedulingHeuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cicirello.search.problems.scheduling.SchedulingHeuristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstructiveHeuristic
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EarliestDueDate, WeightedShortestProcessingTime, WeightedShortestProcessingTimeLateOnly

    public abstract class SchedulingHeuristic
extends Object
implements ConstructiveHeuristic
    This class serves as an abstract base class for the scheduling heuristics of the library, handling common functionality such as maintaining the scheduling problem instance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SingleMachineSchedulingProblemData data
      The instance data of the scheduling problem that is the target of the heuristic.
      protected SingleMachineSchedulingProblem problem
      The instance of the scheduling problem that is the target of the heuristic.

      int completePermutationLength()
      Gets the required length of permutations representing solutions to the problem instance for which this constructive heuristic is configured.

      Gets a reference to the instance of the optimization problem that is the subject of this heuristic.
